[[Pango]] [[Pango#Support_for_OpenType_features | supports the <code>locl</code> tag]] since version 1.17. [[XeTeX]] supports <code>locl</code> since version 0.995. As of July 2008, very few Windows applications support the <code>locl</code> feature tag. From the Adobe [[CS3]] suite, only [[Adobe InDesign| InDesign]] has support for it.<ref>http://store.adobe.com/type/browser/pdfs/OTGuide.pdf p. 15</ref>
[[Pango]] [[Pango#Support_for_OpenType_features | supports the <code>locl</code> tag]] since version 1.17. [[XeTeX]] supports <code>locl</code> since version 0.995. As of July 2008, very few Windows applications support the <code>locl</code> feature tag. From the Adobe [[CS3]] suite, only [[Adobe InDesign| InDesign]] has support for it.<ref>http://store.adobe.com/type/browser/pdfs/OTGuide.pdf p. 15</ref>

The status of Romanian support in the free fonts that ship with [[Fedora (operating system)|Fedora]] is maintained [http://fedoraproject.org/wiki/L10N/Tasks/Ro_fonts#Font_status_matrix here].
